snippet: Liberal critics attacked Jim Lehrer for not challenging Mitt Romney enough and for allowing the candidates to walk over the format.
abstract: Liberal critics attacked Jim Lehrer for not challenging Mitt Romney enough and for allowing the candidates to walk over the format.
lead_paragraph: Critics on both sides of the aisle had plenty to say about the new presidential debate format unveiled on Wednesday. Those on the left were particularly withering about the performance of the moderator, Jim Lehrer. Bill Press, a liberal radio host, said Mr. Lehrer “lost control of the debate, and Mitt Romney ran all over him like a truck crushing a bug.” Brian Stelter has the full story here.

headline.main: Debate Format Comes Under Fire. So Does the Moderator.
